messages.title: Campaigning for London
messages.content: Maajid Nawaz - Fighting extremism, Inspiring across parties.

messages.title: What Maajid Nawaz will do for you and your family
messages.content: Raise the personal allowance, cutting at least £12,500 to income tax for nearly 30 million people by an extra £400. Protect the education budget, investing in early-years education and expending the pupil premium to help the poorest children.

messages.title: In government, the Liberal Democrats have stopped Tory policies to...
messages.content: Weaken legislation which protects our environment, allow bosses to fire their staff with no reason, open up schools to be run as a business for a profit.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Maajid and Lib Dems committed to building 300,000 new affordable houses a year under 'Rent-to-Buy' scheme.
Lib Dems will invest an extra £2.15 billion in mental health care and achieve mental health parity with physical health.
Maajid, a respected campaigner against extremism, wants real political reform in the UK.

issues.education: Protect the education budget, investing in early-years education and expending the pupil premium to help the poorest children.
issues.environment: Weaken legislation which protects our environment
issues.health: Lib Dems will invest an extra £2.15 billion in mental health care and achieve mental health parity with physical health.

housing.content: Maajid and Lib Dems committed to building 300,000 new affordable houses a year under 'Rent-to-Buy' scheme.

leaflet.personalStatement: Maajid Nawaz - Standing up for liberty in Hampstead and Kilburn.

endorsements.endorsement: Even if you don't support any other Lib Dem... I support the great Maajid Nawaz.
Keep up the good work that you do. Much admiration...
Defend secularism and democracy by voting Maajid Nawaz

leaflet.additionalNotes: Maajid will listen to local people in Hampstead and Kilburn.
